briefTitle: Postoperative Use of Zoledronic Acid in Breast Cancer Patients After Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy
officialTitle: A Randomized, Multicenter, Open Phase III Study Comparing the Postoperative Use of Zoledronic Acid Versus no Treatment in Patients With Histological Tumor Residuals After Preoperative Anthracycline and Taxane Containing Chemotherapy for Primary Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The event-free survival (EFS) after zoledronic acid for 5 years versus no postoperative treatment in patients with "chemo-insensitive" breast cancer (ypT1-4 and/or ypN1-3) after preoperative anthracycline/taxane containing chemotherapy.
